instance_template:
loc("SubDock"; "CoralPass"; "VentStream"; "BeaconAlpha"; "DeepLoop"; "BeaconBeta"; "NodeX"; "BeaconGamma").
edge("SubDock","CoralPass",2). edge("CoralPass","SubDock",2).
edge("SubDock","VentStream",4). edge("VentStream","SubDock",4).
edge("CoralPass","BeaconAlpha",1). edge("BeaconAlpha","CoralPass",1).
edge("CoralPass","DeepLoop",1). edge("DeepLoop","CoralPass",1).
edge("DeepLoop","VentStream",1). edge("VentStream","DeepLoop",1).
edge("VentStream","BeaconBeta",2). edge("BeaconBeta","VentStream",2).
edge("VentStream","NodeX",1). edge("NodeX","VentStream",1).
edge("NodeX","BeaconGamma",3). edge("BeaconGamma","NodeX",3).
edge("BeaconGamma","BeaconAlpha",4). edge("BeaconAlpha","BeaconGamma",4).
time(0..32).
max_heat(10).
limit(16).
generator:
at("SubDock", 0).
heat(0, 0).
{ move(L2, T) : edge(L1, L2, C) ; pulse(L1, T) ; cooldown(T) : L1 == "NodeX" ; stay(T) } 1 :- at(L1, T), time(T), T < 32, not occupied_ongoing(T).
occupied_ongoing(T+1) :- pulse(_, T).
occupied_ongoing(T+1) :- cooldown(T).
at(L2, T+1) :- move(L2, T).
at(L, T+1) :- pulse(L, T).
at(L, T+2) :- pulse(L, T), T+2 <= 32.
at(L, T+1) :- cooldown(T), at(L, T).
at(L, T+2) :- cooldown(T), at(L, T), T+2 <= 32.
at(L, T+1) :- at(L, T), stay(T).
heat(T+1, H+C) :- move(L2, T), at(L1, T), edge(L1, L2, C), heat(T, H).
heat(T+1, H) :- pulse(_, T), heat(T, H).
heat(T+2, H+1) :- pulse(_, T), heat(T, H), T+2 <= 32.
heat(T+1, H) :- cooldown(T), heat(T, H).
heat(T+2, 0) :- cooldown(T), T+2 <= 32.
heat(T+1, H) :- heat(T, H), stay(T).

hard_constraints.description: The accumulated thermal load of the drone must not exceed the specified maximum tolerance at any point in the mission.
Acoustic pulses at BeaconAlpha and BeaconBeta are mandatory components of the survey mission.
The acoustic pulse at BeaconAlpha must be concluded no later than the fifth minute of the mission.
An acoustic pulse at BeaconGamma is required if and only if all mandatory survey pulses are completed within an eight-minute window.
hard_constraints.asp_rule:
mandatory_finished_by_8 :- pulse("BeaconAlpha", T1), pulse("BeaconBeta", T2), T1+2 <= 8, T2+2 <= 8.
:- mandatory_finished_by_8, not pulse("BeaconGamma", _).
:- pulse("BeaconGamma", _), not mandatory_finished_by_8.

hard_constraints.description: Upon arrival at the sensor hub NodeX, the drone is required to either initiate an acoustic pulse or commence a thermal cooldown sequence before proceeding to another node.
hard_constraints.asp_rule:
entry("NodeX", T) :- at("NodeX", T), not at("NodeX", T-1).
:- entry("NodeX", T), not pulse("NodeX", T), not cooldown(T).

hard_constraints.description: The total number of discrete actions, encompassing movements, acoustic pulses, and thermal cooldowns, must not exceed sixteen.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- #count { T : move(_, _, T); T : pulse(_, T); T : cooldown(T) } > 16.

hard_constraints.description: To prevent signal interference, consecutive acoustic pulses are prohibited unless the drone reconfigures its systems by visiting the VentStream between pulse events.
hard_constraints.asp_rule:
visited_vent(T1, T2) :- at("VentStream", T), time(T1), time(T2), T1 < T, T < T2.
:- pulse(_, T1), pulse(_, T2), T1 < T2, not visited_vent(T1, T2).

soft_constraints.description: The primary objective is to maximize operational efficiency by minimizing the total duration of time steps in which the drone is not actively engaged in an acoustic pulse.
soft_constraints.asp_rule:
pulse_active(T) :- pulse(_, T).
pulse_active(T+1) :- pulse(_, T).
penalty("TimeWaste", (T), 1) :- time(T), not pulse_active(T), T < Tend, Tend = #max { T1+2 : pulse(_, T1) }.
